meta.title: Triptomatic - Passenger transport made easy
meta.description: Triptomatic’s easy-to-use platform simplifies scheduling and managing patient transport
meta.keywords: Patient transport, hospital, scheduling, managing, patient transport

homePage.hero_text: Join hundreds of companies to optimize your workflows with intuitive and efficient software.
homePage.trusted_by_text: Trusted by hundreds of amazing companies
homePage.all_in_one_title: All in one software for your business
homePage.label: Label
homePage.content_1: Our mission is to make the transport of people simple, efficient and transparent.
homePage.content_2: With Triptomatic, we offer you a powerful tool that digitally maps the entire life cycle of a transport - from booking to invoicing to reporting.
homePage.content_3: By using intelligent algorithms, automation and integrations with your partners, we support you in making optimal use of resources and reducing administrative effort to a minimum.
homePage.testimonials_title: Real Client Experiences Driving Our Success
homePage.testimonial_1_text: Thanks to Triptomatic, I had a stress-free, amazing trip! The platform provided personalized itineraries and top-notch recommendations, making my travel experience truly special.

meta.title: Triptomatic - Passenger transport made easy
meta.description: Triptomatic’s easy-to-use platform simplifies scheduling and managing patient transport
meta.keywords: Patient transport, hospital, scheduling, managing, patient transport

nemtPage.hero_title: All-in-one solution for your NEMT operations
nemtPage.hero_text: From calltaking to scheduling and execution to billing, we offer you a platform that helps you increase your efficiency.
nemtPage.scheduling_text_content: Whether you prefer assisted dispatching with intelligent insights or fully automatic scheduling on autopilot, our advanced planning solution can handle it all.
nemtPage.scheduling_list_content_1: Consistently delivers high-quality schedules tailored to your preferences.
nemtPage.scheduling_list_content_2: Minimize delays and overtime through advanced algorithms that optimize routing.
nemtPage.scheduling_list_content_3: Automatically detect logical passenger combinations to maximize efficiency.
nemtPage.scheduling_list_content_4: Stay updated with arrival times, delays, and live vehicle locations.
nemtPage.scheduling_list_content_5: Effortlessly adjust schedules with an intuitive interface.
nemtPage.invoicing_text_content: Simplify your billing process with our automated invoicing system. From pricing calculations to accounting integration, we handle the complexities so you can focus on your operations.
nemtPage.invoicing_list_content_1: Automatic Price Calculation: Eliminate human error
nemtPage.invoicing_list_content_2: Set your own pricing rules: Manage multiple payers, accounting for copay, insurer rules, and hospital contracts.
nemtPage.invoicing_list_content_3: Factoring & Accounting Integration: Interfaces with factoring banks and your accounting software ensure smooth financial management.
nemtPage.invoicing_list_content_4: Collective Invoices: Consolidate invoices for simplified processing and clearer reporting.
nemtPage.iconBox_text_1: Mobile app for drivers for seamless communication and tracking
nemtPage.iconBox_text_2: Easy trip entry with intelligence to speed up input and prevent errors
nemtPage.iconBox_text_3: Booking widget to enable trip requests from your own website
nemtPage.iconBox_text_4: Integration with hospitals and insurance companies to reduce manual data input
nemtPage.iconBox_text_5: Status page to share with bookers and passengers to reduce phone calls
nemtPage.iconBox_text_6: Reporting to let you keep track of your business

meta.title: Triptomatic - Passenger transport made easy
meta.description: Triptomatic’s easy-to-use platform simplifies scheduling and managing patient transport
meta.keywords: Patient transport, hospital, scheduling, managing, patient transport

hospitalsPage.hero_text: Triptomatic’s easy-to-use platform simplifies scheduling and managing patient transport
hospitalsPage.simplified_booking_text_content: An easy way to book a trip in less than 30 seconds. No more papers, post-its, phone calls or faxes
hospitalsPage.simplified_booking_content_1: Book trips paid by the patient, hospital or insurer
hospitalsPage.simplified_booking_content_2: Book single trips, return trips and series
hospitalsPage.simplified_booking_content_3: Smart input fields to fasten the booking process
hospitalsPage.simplified_booking_content_5: EHR integration (with SSO) for quick & correct data entry
hospitalsPage.manage_transports_text_content: Triptomatic matches the right transporter and keeps you in the loop at all times
hospitalsPage.manage_transports_content_1: Feedback to your EHR: view status & ETA’s
hospitalsPage.manage_transports_content_2: Find transportation automatically: Use our network of transport companies or configure your own partnerships
hospitalsPage.manage_transports_content_3: Structured communication with the transporter in case of issues
hospitalsPage.pricing_billing_text_content: We keep all the rules of the health insurance companies up to date. No need to worry about that anymore.
hospitalsPage.pricing_billing_content_1: Prices are calculated taking into account your business rules
hospitalsPage.pricing_billing_content_2: Apply insurance rules to maximise reimbursements
hospitalsPage.pricing_billing_content_3: Automated invoice generation on behalf of transporter companies
hospitalsPage.robust_security_text_content: A modern solution that fully complies with the latest GDPR regulations and beyond
hospitalsPage.robust_security_content_1: Safeguard patient data with encrypted communication
hospitalsPage.robust_security_content_2: Comply with healthcare privacy regulations (GDPR / ISO27001)
hospitalsPage.robust_security_content_3: Regular security audits to ensure optimal data protection
hospitalsPage.ongoing_support_training_text: Expert guidance from initial setup to daily use
hospitalsPage.exports_and_dashboard_text: Review historical data on reporting dashboards or export your data (csv / Excel)
